HDG.ID.content: idem, to auto > for something to be the same, one is always enough: “plant is a plant” is a tautology [Schelling?] > principle of identity (considered highest principle of thought), A = A speaks of equality, doesn’t define A as the same, conceals what principle is trying to say: A is A, every A is itself the same
